name: Greek Yogurt Power Parfait
description: Layered Greek yogurt with fresh fruits, granola, and honey. Quick and nourishing breakfast.

instructions.instruction: Add half the yogurt to a tall glass or jar.
Layer half the fruits on top.
Top with remaining fruits, granola, and almonds.

tips: Greek yogurt has twice the protein of regular yogurt.
Perfect snack before or after workouts.
Prepare in a jar for portable breakfasts.
storageInfo: Can be prepared the night before without granola. Add granola fresh to maintain crunch.
servingSuggestion: Enjoy for breakfast or as a post-workout snack.
variations: Add protein powder to increase protein content.
Make a tropical version with mango and coconut.
Add peanut butter for healthy fats.
